title: ➽Spacious Somerville 1 Bedroom Available October!
posting_body: ['PROPERTY INFO', 'ID: 302251177', 'Rent: $2,300 / Month', 'Beds: 1', 'Bath: 1', 'Available Date: 10/01/2022', 'Pet: Cat Friendly', 'Rent Includes:: Heat, Hot Water', 'Parking:: street parking', '5 Minutes from the brand new Green Line Station!', '(Gilman Square)', 'Spacious Somerville 1 Bedroom Featuring Hardwood Floors, Updated Appliances, Fantastic Natural Light, High Ceilings, Good Closet Space, and Onsite Laundry.', 'Right in the Beautiful Somerville near Assembly Square, Target, Encore, Bus Lines, and Many Fantastic Bars/Restaurants!', 'Video Tour Available!', 'Available October!', 'Contact me via email!', 'Crew Fitzpatrick', 'CFB Real Estate powered by Keller Williams', 'Rentals @ CFBRealestate .', 'com', 'Utilities: Heat and Hot Water Included (Tenant Pays Electricity)', "Move in Costs: First Month's Rent, Security Deposit, and Broker Fee (No Last Month's Rent Upfront)", 'Thanks for checking out my listing.', "I would love to work with you and find you a fantastic apartment, I offer Boston's largest personalized video database for ease of access!", 'To confirm availability for this unit and to see other great available listings please email me!', 'Bus: 87 Somerville Ave @', 'Loring St (0.36 mi)', 'Bus: 85 Avon St @ Central St (0.15 mi)', 'Bus: 83 Somerville Ave @ Central St (0.39 mi)', 'Bus: 88 Highland Ave @', 'Trull Ln (0.05 mi)', 'Bus: 90 Highland Ave @', 'Trull Ln (0.05 mi)', 'Bus: 80 Medford St @ Thurston St (0.26 mi)', 'Bus: 101 Broadway @ Thurston St (0.53 mi)']
